plot: Burning is a short film about guilt and redemption. A burning guilt that comes between a couple, illustrated through poems. And a confession that comes in response to desire.
title: Burning
plot_es: Burning is a short film about guilt and redemption. A burning guilt that comes between a couple, illustrated through poems. And a confession that comes in response to desire.
plot_en: Burning is a short film about guilt and redemption. A burning guilt that comes between a couple, illustrated through poems. And a confession that comes in response to desire.
